Package: sk.hax.software.os

[Groovy] Class CommandTask

      • sk.hax.software.os.CommandTask

      • Base class for command-based interactive tasks. Contains common functionality for this kind of task. Each command is to be implemented as a method with name 'command_[name]', with '[name]' replaced with the command itself. The methods may have an arbitrary number of parameters. These are then mapped from the command arguments.

        Authors:
        mio

        • Method Detail

          • void command_(java.lang.String command, java.lang.String[] args)

            Default method for handling a command. Is invoked if no method of name 'command_[name]' exists. May be overridden to implement custom functionality.

            Parameters:
            command - command sent to the task
            args - arguments of the command

          • @java.lang.Override void handle(byte[] data)

          • void prompt()

            Produces prompt to display to the user when expecting input.

          • @java.lang.Override void start()
